name: getBaseTagList
description: Gets a comma-delimited list of uppercase ancestor tag names, as a string. The first list element is the current tag. If the current tag is nested, the next element is the parent tag. If the function is called for a top-level tag, it returns an empty string.

params.name: caller
params.description: Adobe only. Not aliased in Lucee

coldfusion.notes: ACF behavavior is different from Lucee.
